name: Wax On, Wax Off (Playdate)
description:
Make Mr. Miyagi proud by waxing on and off with perfect timing.

To play wax on with one perfect rotation then wax off with a rotation in the opposite direction. Keep the correct tempo and you will build up combos. Bad tempo or rotating too far means losing points.

This game was created in the timespan of 3 days 3 hours for PlayJam2. 
I wanted to create a rhythm game with a soundtrack that changed depending on how well you were doing but with only 3 hours I ended up using a robotic voice for half the sounds, have no music and have done minimal testing.

I'm still happy though as this is my first ever game jam entry.

If you think this could actually be a half decent game please let me know and I'll continue development after the game jam is over.

I sadly removed the gamejam entry. Trying to get it re-uploaded.
